item.title: [mic] Visions of Dread
item.description:
Sorcery

Target opponent puts a creature card of choice from their graveyard onto the battlefield under your control.

Flashback {8}{B}{B}. This spell costs {X} less to cast this way, where X is the greatest mana value of a commander you own on the battlefield or in the command zone. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

https://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/feature/boosters-and-products-innistrad-midnight-hunt-2021-09-02

item.title: [mic] Curse of Obsession
item.description:
Enchantment — Aura Curse

Encahnt player

At the beginning of enchanted player's draw step, that player draws two additional cards.

At the beginning of enchanted player's end step, that player discards their hand.

https://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/feature/boosters-and-products-innistrad-midnight-hunt-2021-09-02

item.title: [mic] Visions of Ruin
item.description:
Sorcery

Each opponent sacrifices an artifact. For each artifact sacrificed this way, you create a Treasure token.

Flashback {8}{R}{R}. This spell costs {X} less to cast this way, where X is the greatest mana value of a commander you own on the battlefield or in the command zone. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

https://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/feature/boosters-and-products-innistrad-midnight-hunt-2021-09-02

item.title: [mic] Visions of Dominance
item.description:
Sorcery

Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature, then double the number of +1/+1 counters on it.

Flashback {8}{G}{G}. This spell costs {X} less to cast this way, where X is the greatest mana value of a commander you own on the battlefield or in the command zone. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

https://media.wizards.com/2021/mid/en_ss7Ep3ORe2.png

item.title: [mic] Wilhelt, the Rotcleaver
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Zombie Warrior

Whenever another zombie you control dies, if it didn't have decayed, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token with decayed. (It can't block. When it attacks, sacrifice it at end of combat.)

At the beginning of your end step, you may sacrifice a Zombie. If you do, draw a card.

item.title: [mid] Sigarda, Champion of Light
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Angel

Flying, trample

Humans you control get +1/+1.

Coven — Whenever Sigarda attacks, if you control three or more creatures with different powers, look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal a Human creature card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

item.title: [mid] Sigarda, Champion of Light
item.description:

Humans you control get +1/+1.

Coven — Whenever Sigarda attacks, if you control three or more creatures with different powers, look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal a Human creature card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

item.title: [mid] Brimestone Vandal
item.description:
Creature — Devil

Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

If it's neither day nor night, it becomes day as Brimestone Vandal enters the battlefield.

Whenever day becomes night or night becomes day, Brimestone Vandal deals 1 damage to each opponent.

item.title: [pj21] Edgar Markov
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Vampire Knight

Eminence — Whenever you cast another Vampire spell, if Edgar Markov is in the command zone or on the battlefield, create a 1/1 black Vampire creature token.

First strike, haste

Whenever Edgar Markov attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on each Vampire you control.

item.title: [pj21] K'rrik, Son of Yawgmoth
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Phyrexian Horror Minion

({B/P} can be paid with either {B} or 2 life.)

Lifelink

For each {B} in a cost, you may pay 2 life rather than pay that mana.

Whenever you cast a black spell, put a +1/+1 counter on K'rrik, Son of Yawgmoth.

item.title: [pj21] Ezuri, Claw of Progress
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Phyrexian Elf Warrior

Whenever a creature with power 2 or less enters the battlefield under your control, you get an experience counter.

At the beginning of combat on your turn, put X +1/+1 counters on another target creature you control, where X is the number of experience counters you have.

item.title: [pj21] Mizzix of the Izmagnus
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Goblin Wizard

Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell with mana value greater than the number of experience counters you have, you get an experience counter.

Instant and sorcery spells you cast cost {1} less to cast for each experience counter you have.

item.title: [j21] Hell Mongrel
item.description:
Creature — Nightmare Dog

Discard a card: Hell Mongrel gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

Madness {2}{B} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

item.description:
Creature — Bird

item.title: [j21] Haunted Dead
item.description:
Creature — Zombie

When Haunted Dead enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.

{1}{B}, Discard two cards: Return Haunted Dead from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.

item.title: [j21] Harrow
item.description:
Instant

As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a land.

Search your library for up to two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

item.title: [j21] Harmonic Prodigy
item.description:
Creature — Human Wizard

Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)

If an ability of a Shaman or another Wizard you control triggers, that ability triggers an additional time.
